DataElement.preferredName: Prior Radiation Therapy Total Dose Administered Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the full quantity of treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation that was previously given.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Radiation Therapy Total Dose Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed with a max of 5 characters and 2 decimals, units of measure not specified.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Total dose of prior radiation
ReferenceDocuments.description: Total dose of prior radiation therapy administered

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
